feed.title: Postiz Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Postiz: Better Media Uploader
entry.content:
What's Changed

Better media uploader - Upload multiple pictures - Select multiple pictures - Drag and drop pictures - Delete pictures

  • Better media uploader by @nevo-david in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/526

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/compare/v1.23.2...v1.24.1

entry.title: New release for Postiz: Change License to AGPL3
entry.content:
We are changing the license from Apache2 to AGPL3 to sustain the software better. What does it mean for you?

AGPL3 is considered to be fully open-source, like Apache 2.0. You can use it for commercial use as much as you want.

The main thing is that if you modify the code, you must open-source it. Every version before 1.25.1 is very stable, including Apache2.

Check this to see the difference: https://chatgpt.com/share/677b82c1-7c74-800a-908f-d69cc48c0d05

entry.title: New release for Postiz: Short-linking!
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • bugfix: #517 - Switch to semver (tags) for container versions by @jamesread in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/530
  • fixed typo in developers guide section by @ChandraShekharAgrawal in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/525
  • .com.de support added to all.two.level.subdomain.ts by @funnymomo in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/532
  • Update all.two.level.subdomain.ts by @mbi001 in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/531
  • Added shortlinking option by @nevo-david in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/543

New Contributors

  • @ChandraShekharAgrawal made their first contribution in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/525
  • @funnymomo made their first contribution in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/532
  • @mbi001 made their first contribution in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/531

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/compare/v1.25.1...v1.26.1

entry.title: New release for Postiz: S3 default integrity change - effecting cloudflare
entry.content:
In AWS SDK for JavaScript v3.729.0, they released changes to the S3 client that adopts new default integrity protections.

This automatically crashes every R2 upload. See more here: https://github.com/aws/aws-sdk-js-v3/issues/6810

AWS's response is awful; they don't care. We have followed up with some of the fixes and implemented them in the repo. Please make sure you upgrade to the latest docker or you might not be able to use Postiz.

entry.title: New release for Postiz: Telegram support!
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Farcaster login by @nevo-david in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/563
  • Added telegram by @nevo-david in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/568

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/compare/v1.27.2...v1.28.1
